sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.* FROM EP_PROJECTDETAIL T WHERE T.EPD_SISDEL='0'
T.EP_SNO =#EP_SNO#
ORDER BY T.EPD_NID

select count(1) from EP_PROJECTDETAIL t
t.epd_sisdel='0'
and t.epd_nId =#searchA#

select EPD_NID, EP_SNO, EPD_SASKNO, RP_SNO, EPD_SYEAR, UD_SNO, EPD_SREPORTUNITNAME, EPD_NNO, EPD_SNAME, EPD_SNAMEXIAO, EPD_SMODEL, EPD_SSPEC, EPD_SBRAND, EPD_SUNIT, EPD_NNUM, EPD_NPRICE, EPD_NTOTAL, EPD_NNUMSONG, EPD_NPRICESONG, EPD_NTOTALSONG, EPD_NNUMJIAN, EPD_NPRICEJIAN, EPD_NTOTALJIAN, EPD_NCANNOT, EPD_SAPPROVENOTE, EPD_SSTAT, EPD_SPURTYPE, EPD_SISIMPORT, EPD_SISFREETAX, EPD_SJKFILE, EPD_SMSFILE, PL_SPARA, PL_SREMARK, PL_SPAYTYPE, PL_SBUYDATE, EPD_SISDEL, EPD_SISVALID, EPD_SREPLYBY, EPD_SREPLYDATE, EPD_SALTERBY, EPD_SALTERDATE, EPD_SDEF1, EPD_SDEF2, EPD_SDEF3, EPD_SDEF4, EPD_SDEF5, EPD_SDEF6, EPD_SDEF7, EPD_SDEF8, EPD_SDEF9, EPD_SDEF10, EPD_SDEF11, EPD_SDEF12, EPD_SDEF13, EPD_SDEF14, EPD_SDEF15, EPD_SDEF16, EPD_SDEF17, EPD_SDEF18, EPD_SDEF19, EPD_SDEF20, EPD_NDEF1, EPD_NDEF2, EPD_NDEF3, EPD_NDEF4, EPD_NDEF5, EPD_NDEF6, EPD_NDEF7, EPD_NDEF8, EPD_NDEF9, EPD_NDEF10, EPD_DDEF1, EPD_DDEF2, EPD_DDEF3, EPD_DDEF4, EPD_DDEF5 from EP_PROJECTDETAIL
order by $orderByClause$

select EPD_NID, EP_SNO, EPD_SASKNO, RP_SNO, EPD_SYEAR, UD_SNO, EPD_SREPORTUNITNAME, EPD_NNO, EPD_SNAME, EPD_SNAMEXIAO, EPD_SMODEL, EPD_SSPEC, EPD_SBRAND, EPD_SUNIT, EPD_NNUM, EPD_NPRICE, EPD_NTOTAL, EPD_NNUMSONG, EPD_NPRICESONG, EPD_NTOTALSONG, EPD_NNUMJIAN, EPD_NPRICEJIAN, EPD_NTOTALJIAN, EPD_NCANNOT, EPD_SAPPROVENOTE, EPD_SSTAT, EPD_SPURTYPE, EPD_SISIMPORT, EPD_SISFREETAX, EPD_SJKFILE, EPD_SMSFILE, PL_SPARA, PL_SREMARK, PL_SPAYTYPE, PL_SBUYDATE, EPD_SISDEL, EPD_SISVALID, EPD_SREPLYBY, EPD_SREPLYDATE, EPD_SALTERBY, EPD_SALTERDATE, EPD_SDEF1, EPD_SDEF2, EPD_SDEF3, EPD_SDEF4, EPD_SDEF5, EPD_SDEF6, EPD_SDEF7, EPD_SDEF8, EPD_SDEF9, EPD_SDEF10, EPD_SDEF11, EPD_SDEF12, EPD_SDEF13, EPD_SDEF14, EPD_SDEF15, EPD_SDEF16, EPD_SDEF17, EPD_SDEF18, EPD_SDEF19, EPD_SDEF20, EPD_NDEF1, EPD_NDEF2, EPD_NDEF3, EPD_NDEF4, EPD_NDEF5, EPD_NDEF6, EPD_NDEF7, EPD_NDEF8, EPD_NDEF9, EPD_NDEF10, EPD_DDEF1, EPD_DDEF2, EPD_DDEF3, EPD_DDEF4, EPD_DDEF5 from EP_PROJECTDETAIL where EPD_NID = #EPD_NID:DECIMAL#
